What Noetfield provides

Deliverable-led governance artefacts designed to be readable under audit and useful for boards.

  • Board memo (decision options + recommendation)
  • Trust Ledger snapshot (owners, controls, evidence pointers)
  • Controls map (risks ↔ controls ↔ proof)
  • Evidence index (reviewed + missing, explicit assumptions)

Privacy boundaries

Public intake is routing-only. Sensitive artefacts move only after scope and channel are agreed.

  • Data minimization by default
  • No credentials or secrets in public forms
  • Retention and deletion terms set per engagement
Security posture (summary)

Least-privilege operations, revocable access paths, evidence-first delivery, and a defined incident response path for enterprise engagements (SOW/DPA-scoped).

Output spec Noetfield App Privacy
Sub-processors and contracting

Sub-processors are disclosed in engagement documents (DPA/SOW). Contracting is routed via Gate with Request ID continuity.
